hierophant:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
hierophant:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

hierophant:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
hierophant:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

hierophant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
hierophant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !hierophant:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

hierophant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
hierophant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !hierophant:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
